alert.note: Alert for Butts; Clayton; Fayette; Henry; Jasper; Lamar; Meriwether; Monroe; Pike; Spalding; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Spalding, east central Fayette, east central Meriwether, eastern Pike, northern Monroe, southern Henry, Upson, Butts, south central Clayton, southwestern Jasper and Lamar Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Jw Smith Reservoir to near Williamson to near Imlac, and moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Griffin, McDonough, Thomaston, Barnesville, Jackson, Forsyth, Zebulon, Hampton, Lovejoy, Locust Grove, Flovilla, Milner, Jenkinsburg, Yatesville, Williamson, Orchard Hill, Meansville, Sunny Side, Aldora, and Sunset Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central, north central and west central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Butts; Clayton; Fayette; Henry; Jasper; Lamar; Meriwether; Monroe; Pike; Spalding; Upson
